info.occupation: From 1980 to 1985 he was partner in the company CLUSTER-DATA snc, from 1985 to 1988 owner of the company MIND-srl (Medical Intelligent Data), from 1989 to 1993 consultant for the Istituto per la Ricerca Scientifica e Tecnologica (IRST), Trento and for Ladseb-CNR
info.summary:
Claudio Sossai works as a From 1980 to 1985 he was partner in the company CLUSTER-DATA snc, from 1985 to 1988 owner of the company MIND-srl (Medical Intelligent Data), from 1989 to 1993 consultant for the Istituto per la Ricerca Scientifica e Tecnologica (IRST), Trento and for Ladseb-CNR in ISIB-CNR, Corso Stati Uniti 4, I-35127 Padova, Italy, and his\her h-index is 7, g-index is 17. His\Her interests are :
 Mobile Robot; Possibilistic Logic; Uncertainty; Formal Method; Possibility Theory;
